info.description:
yawn
++++

.. contents :: 

Summary
=======

Yawn is Awesome WickedNess for tests (it is a helper for selenium testing)

Get Started
===========

* Download and install from source

Author
======

James Gardner

Changes
=======

0.1.1
-----

2014-10-17
~~~~~~~~~~

* PEP8 Compliant
* Made firefox extensions for console logging optional, and not enabled by
  default


0.1.0
-----

2014-10-16
~~~~~~~~~~

* Created package and added the ``get_driver()`` function.

See https://bitbucket.org/thejimmyg/testbed for a better desciption of how this
package fits into a Selenium browser testing infrastructure.

License
=======
yawn - Yawn is Awesome WickedNess for tests (it is a helper for selenium testing)

You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.


Download
========
